oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Anthony Quitman
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A portrait of John Anthony Quitman in an elaborate military uniform, astride on his horse. In the background are some rocks, another persons on a horse, and what appears to be canyons. His horse has on a military saddle pad.
Served as a brigadier general in the Mexican War and a major general in the U.S. regular army beginning in 1847. He was later governor of Mississippi and a U.S. Congressman.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Quitman, John Anthony, 1798-1858
